ing: 1 (12 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
1 (6 ounce) package orange flavored Jell-OÂ® mix
des: "A friend taught me to make this years ago - without a recipe.  It is very quick and easy. The sweet, creamy salad is great as a cool, refreshing side dish or dessert."
ins: In a large bowl, blend the thawed frozen whipped topping, mandarin oranges, cottage cheese and orange flavored gelatin mix. Chill in the refrigerator 2 to 3 hours before serving.
